name: Cars Vs Monsters
description:
Race your car through crazy shooting monsters. Shoot at the monsters or tactfully drive around them. Steer your way around a challenging road avoiding obstacles. Reward yourself by collecting Jewels and Coins. Spiky shooting monsters have invaded your route. Do you have the nerves to beat these monsters in your shiny cars! Who is going to win in your driving skills in this amazing nerve wrecking game of Cars Vs Monsters!
Idea experts Ekam Bhatia/US, Utkarsh Kamra/NL, Tanvi Kamra/NL, Shuban Tiwari/US
